TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Matrix extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示用于二维空间中的变换的 3x3 仿射变换矩阵。

span.span: Represents a 3x3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space.
